# Example README.Rmd

Here's a branch specific shield:

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, results="asis"}
shield <- paste0("[![ubuntu master](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/ismoh/noitamp/Ubuntu%20Lua%20Unit%20Testing/",
                 system("git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD", intern = TRUE),
                 "?label=&logo=ubuntu&style=flat-square)]")
cat(shield)
```
